UserPackageLicense.name: UserPackageLicense
UserPackageLicense.description: Represents a license for an installed managed package, assigned to a specific user.

IsRevoked.description: Reserved for internal use. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

LastCreatedByChangeId.description: ID of the user access change record related to this managed package license assignment. This field is available only if user access policies are enabled. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

LastDeletedByChangeId.description: ID of the user access change record related to this managed package license assignment being revoked. This field is available only if user access policies are enabled. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

PackageLicenseId.description: The 18-character Globally Unique ID (GUID) that identifies the package license

UserId.description: The User ID of the user licensed to use this package
